fields.name: dataPlatform
fields.description: Fetch a Data Platform by primary key (urn)

fields.name: corpUser
fields.description: Fetch a CorpUser, representing a DataHub platform user, by primary key (urn)

fields.name: corpGroup
fields.description: Fetch a CorpGroup, representing a DataHub platform group by primary key (urn)

fields.name: dataset
fields.description: Fetch a Dataset by primary key (urn)

fields.name: versionedDataset
fields.description: Fetch a Dataset by primary key (urn) at a point in time based on aspect versions (versionStamp)

fields.name: dashboard
fields.description: Fetch a Dashboard by primary key (urn)

fields.name: notebook
fields.description: Fetch a Notebook by primary key (urn)

fields.name: chart
fields.description: Fetch a Chart by primary key (urn)

fields.name: dataFlow
fields.description: Fetch a Data Flow (or Data Pipeline) by primary key (urn)

fields.name: dataJob
fields.description: Fetch a Data Job (or Data Task) by primary key (urn)

fields.name: tag
fields.description: Fetch a Tag by primary key (urn)

fields.name: view
fields.description: Fetch a View by primary key (urn)

fields.name: form
fields.description: Fetch a Form by primary key (urn)

fields.name: role
fields.description: Fetch a Role by primary key (urn)

fields.name: structuredProperty
fields.description: Fetch a Structured Property by primary key (urn)

fields.name: erModelRelationship
fields.description: Fetch a ERModelRelationship by primary key (urn)

fields.name: glossaryTerm
fields.description: Fetch a Glossary Term by primary key (urn)

fields.name: glossaryNode
fields.description: Fetch a Glossary Node by primary key (urn)

fields.name: container
fields.description: Fetch an Entity Container by primary key (urn)

fields.name: domain
fields.description: Fetch a Domain by primary key (urn)

fields.name: assertion
fields.description: Fetch an Assertion by primary key (urn)

fields.name: listPolicies
fields.description: List all DataHub Access Policies

fields.name: getGrantedPrivileges
fields.description: Get all granted privileges for the given actor and resource

fields.name: mlModel
fields.description: Incubating: Fetch an ML Model by primary key (urn)

fields.name: mlModelGroup
fields.description: Incubating: Fetch an ML Model Group by primary key (urn)

fields.name: mlFeature
fields.description: Incubating: Fetch a ML Feature by primary key (urn)

fields.name: mlFeatureTable
fields.description: Incubating: Fetch a ML Feature Table by primary key (urn)

fields.name: mlPrimaryKey
fields.description: Incubating: Fetch a ML Primary Key by primary key (urn)

fields.name: listUsers
fields.description: List all DataHub Users

fields.name: listGroups
fields.description: List all DataHub Groups

fields.name: getEntityCounts
fields.description: Fetches the number of entities ingested by type

fields.name: listDomains
fields.description: List all DataHub Domains

fields.name: getRootGlossaryTerms
fields.description: Get all GlossaryTerms without a parentNode

fields.name: getRootGlossaryNodes
fields.description: Get all GlossaryNodes without a parentNode

fields.name: entityExists
fields.description: Get whether or not not an entity exists

fields.name: entity
fields.description: Gets an entity based on its urn

fields.name: entities
fields.description:
Gets entities based on their urns
checkForExistence will do n+1 sql calls to check for existence of each entity requested if set to true

fields.name: listRoles
fields.description: List all DataHub Roles

fields.name: getInviteToken
fields.description: Get invite token

fields.name: listPosts
fields.description: List all Posts

fields.name: listMyViews
fields.description: List DataHub Views owned by the current user

fields.name: listGlobalViews
fields.description: List Global DataHub Views

fields.name: listQueries
fields.description: List Dataset Queries

fields.name: getQuickFilters
fields.description: Get quick filters to display in auto-complete

fields.name: dataProduct
fields.description: Fetch a DataProduct by primary key (urn)

fields.name: listOwnershipTypes
fields.description: List Custom Ownership Types

fields.name: dataPlatformInstance
fields.description: Fetch a Data Platform Instance by primary key (urn)

fields.name: businessAttribute
fields.description: Fetch a Business Attribute by primary key (urn)

fields.name: listBusinessAttributes
fields.description: Fetch all Business Attributes

fields.name: dataProcessInstance
fields.description: Fetch a Data Process Instance by primary key (urn)

fields.name: application
fields.description: Fetch an Application by primary key (urn)

fields.name: search
fields.description: Full text search against a specific DataHub Entity Type

fields.name: searchAcrossEntities
fields.description: Search DataHub entities

fields.name: scrollAcrossEntities
fields.description: Search DataHub entities by providing a pointer reference for scrolling through results.

fields.name: searchAcrossLineage
fields.description: Search across the results of a graph query on a node

fields.name: scrollAcrossLineage
fields.description: Search across the results of a graph query on a node, uses scroll API

fields.name: autoComplete
fields.description: Autocomplete a search query against a specific DataHub Entity Type

fields.name: autoCompleteForMultiple
fields.description: Autocomplete a search query against a specific set of DataHub Entity Types

fields.name: browse
fields.description:
Hierarchically browse a specific type of DataHub Entity by path
Used by explore in the UI

fields.name: browsePaths
fields.description: Retrieve the browse paths corresponding to an entity

fields.name: aggregateAcrossEntities
fields.description: Aggregate across DataHub entities

fields.name: listDataProductAssets
fields.description: List Data Product assets for a given urn

fields.name: listApplicationAssets
fields.description: List Application assets for a given urn

fields.name: browseV2
fields.description:
Browse for different entities by getting organizational groups and their
aggregated counts + content. Uses browsePathsV2 aspect and replaces our old
browse endpoint.

fields.name: me
fields.description: Fetch details associated with the authenticated user, provided via an auth cookie or header

fields.name: appConfig
fields.description:
Fetch configurations
Used by DataHub UI

fields.name: globalViewsSettings
fields.description:
Fetch the Global Settings related to the Views feature.
Requires the 'Manage Global Views' Platform Privilege.

fields.name: docPropagationSettings
fields.description: Fetch the global settings related to the docs propagation feature.

fields.name: globalHomePageSettings
fields.description: Global settings related to the home page for an instance

fields.name: getAccessToken
fields.description:
Generates an access token for DataHub APIs for a particular user & of a particular type
Deprecated, use createAccessToken instead

fields.name: listAccessTokens
fields.description: List access tokens stored in DataHub.

fields.name: getAccessTokenMetadata
fields.description:
Fetches the metadata of an access token.
This is useful to debug when you have a raw token but don't know the actor.

fields.name: debugAccess
fields.description:
Experimental API to debug Access for users.
Backward incompatible changes will be made without notice in the future.
Do not build on top of this API.

fields.name: getAnalyticsCharts
fields.description: Retrieves a set of server driven Analytics Charts to render in the UI

fields.name: getHighlights
fields.description: Retrieves a set of server driven Analytics Highlight Cards to render in the UI

fields.name: getMetadataAnalyticsCharts
fields.description: Retrieves a set of charts regarding the ingested metadata

fields.name: listRecommendations
fields.description: Fetch recommendations for a particular scenario

fields.name: listSecrets
fields.description: List all secrets stored in DataHub (no values)

fields.name: getSecretValues
fields.description:
Fetch the values of a set of secrets. The caller must have the MANAGE_SECRETS
privilege to use.

fields.name: listIngestionSources
fields.description: List all ingestion sources

fields.name: ingestionSource
fields.description:
Fetch a specific ingestion source
urn: The primary key associated with the ingestion source.

fields.name: listExecutionRequests
fields.description: List all execution requests

fields.name: executionRequest
fields.description:
Get an execution request
urn: The primary key associated with the execution request.

fields.name: getSchemaBlame
fields.description: Returns the most recent changes made to each column in a dataset at each dataset version.

fields.name: getSchemaVersionList
fields.description: Returns the list of schema versions for a dataset.

fields.name: getTimeline
fields.description: Returns a list of timeline actions for an entity based on the filter criteria

fields.name: test
fields.description: Fetch a Test by primary key (urn)

fields.name: listTests
fields.description: List all DataHub Tests

fields.name: batchGetStepStates
fields.description: Batch fetch the state for a set of steps.

fields.name: connection
fields.description:
Get a set of connection details by URN.
This requires the 'Manage Connections' platform privilege.
Returns null if a connection with the provided urn does not exist.

fields.name: versionSet
fields.description: Fetch a Version Set by its URN
